required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tobramycin Inhalation Powder (TIP) in Cystic Fibrosis Patients Infected With Burkholderia Cepacia Complex
clinical_study.official_title: Pilot Study of the in Vivo Efficacy of Tobramycin Inhalation Powder (TIP) in Cystic Fibrosis Patients Infected With Burkholderia Cepacia Complex

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to determine if tobramycin inhalation powder (TIP) can reduce the amount of Burkholderia Cepacia Complex (BCC) species - type of bacteria, in the sputum of cystic fibrosis patient.

primary_outcome.measure: The Change in Sputum Density of BCC in Colony Forming Units (CFUs)/ml From Day 0 to Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
primary_outcome.description: The change in sputum density of BCC in colony forming units (CFUs)/ml from day 0 to day 28 of TIP treatment. Sputum density was calculated by doing serial dilutions of sputum on agar plates and counting colony forming units expressed per ml.

secondary_outcome.measure: The Change in Pulmonary Function Tests, Including Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1), Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) and Maximal Mid-expiratory Flow Rate (FEF25-75), Measured at Day 0 and Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: The main lung function measure was relative change in FEV1 from day 0 to Day 28 reported as %.

other_outcome.measure: The Change in the Measurement of Markers of Pulmonary Inflammation (Neutrophil Counts, Neutrophil Elastase and IL-8 Levels in Sputum) Measured at Day 0 and Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
other_outcome.description: We measured both neutrophil elastase sputum for participants.

other_outcome.measure: Trough and Peak Sputum Tobramycin Concentration Measured on Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
other_outcome.description: We did trough (0 hour) and peak (1 hour post dose) TIP sputum tobramycin concentrations and reported it for participants.

other_outcome.measure: The Change in BCC Planktonic and Biofilm MICs to Tobramycin Measured on Day 0 and on Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
other_outcome.description: For all participants, the minimum inhibitory concentration of tobramycin for planktonic and biofilm grown BCC was measured in the lab on the isolate collected before and after TIP treatment.

other_outcome.measure: The Number of Participants With Adverse Events Measured at Day 14 and at Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
other_outcome.description: The number of participants with adverse events was reported for all participants in the trial.

other_outcome.measure: The Change in the Measurement of Markers of Pulmonary Inflammation (Neutrophil Counts, Neutrophil Elastase and IL-8 Levels in Sputum) Measured at Day 0 and Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
other_outcome.description: We measured both IL-8 sputum for participants.

intervention.description: New inhalation devices such as the podhaler can administer tobramycin inhalation powder TIP/TOBI and achieve very high sputum drug levels. TOBI will be administered using the Podhaler

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 6 years or older
- Diagnosis of CF based on the following: sweat chloride>60 mEq/L or genotype with 2 identifiable mutations consistent with CF; and one or more clinical features consistent with CF.
- Chronically infected with a Burkholderia cepacia complex species (>50% of respiratory specimens positive in the 24 months prior to screening).
- Able to produce sputum (expectorated or induced).
- Able to reproducibly perform pulmonary function testing.
- Written informed consent provided.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Post lung transplantation.
- Pregnancy.
- Acute exacerbation requiring IV or oral antibiotics within 14 days
- Patients currently receiving inhaled tobramycin/TOBI
- A septic or clinically unstable patient, as determined by the investigator.

results_reference.citation: Waters V, Yau Y, Beaudoin T, Wettlaufer J, Tom SK, McDonald N, Rizvi L, Klingel M, Ratjen F, Tullis E. Pilot trial of tobramycin inhalation powder in cystic fibrosis patients with chronic Burkholderia cepacia complex infection. J Cyst Fibros. 2017 Jul;16(4):492-495. doi: 10.1016/j.jcf.2017.02.008. Epub 2017 Mar 3.

group.title: TOBI Podhaler
group.description: TOBI: New inhalation devices such as the podhaler can administer tobramycin inhalation powder TIP/TOBI and achieve very high sputum drug levels. TOBI will be administered using the Podhaler

group.title: TOBI Podhaler
group.description: TOBI: New inhalation devices such as the podhaler can administer tobramycin inhalation powder TIP/TOBI and achieve very high sputum drug levels. TOBI will be administered using the Podhaler

outcome.title: The Change in Sputum Density of BCC in Colony Forming Units (CFUs)/ml From Day 0 to Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
outcome.description: The change in sputum density of BCC in colony forming units (CFUs)/ml from day 0 to day 28 of TIP treatment. Sputum density was calculated by doing serial dilutions of sputum on agar plates and counting colony forming units expressed per ml.
outcome.population: sputum density measurements was calculated for all patients from Day 0 to Day 28

group.description: TOBI: New inhalation devices such as the podhaler can administer tobramycin inhalation powder TIP/TOBI and achieve very high sputum drug levels. TOBI will be administered using the Podhaler

measure.description: The change in sputum density of BCC in colony forming units (CFUs)/ml from day 0 to day 28 of TIP treatment. Sputum density was calculated by doing serial dilutions of sputum on agar plates and counting colony forming units expressed per ml.
measure.population: sputum density measurements was calculated for all patients from Day 0 to Day 28

outcome.title: The Change in Pulmonary Function Tests, Including Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1), Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) and Maximal Mid-expiratory Flow Rate (FEF25-75), Measured at Day 0 and Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
outcome.description: The main lung function measure was relative change in FEV1 from day 0 to Day 28 reported as %.
outcome.population: All patients had lung function measures which were analyzed.

outcome.title: The Change in the Measurement of Markers of Pulmonary Inflammation (Neutrophil Counts, Neutrophil Elastase and IL-8 Levels in Sputum) Measured at Day 0 and Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
outcome.description: We measured both neutrophil elastase sputum for participants.
outcome.population: Sputum inflammatory markers were measured for 8 participants who could produce sputum.

outcome.title: Trough and Peak Sputum Tobramycin Concentration Measured on Day 28 of TIP Treatment.
outcome.description: We did trough (0 hour) and peak (1 hour post dose) TIP sputum tobramycin concentrations and reported it for participants.
outcome.population: We did pre and post TIP sputum tobramycin concentrations in 9 participants at Day 28 since one patient stopped taking the drug.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
